name: Sundown Standoff
description:
This game was made in a game jam by Marc Dolgin and Neil Sarkar. 

There is currently no in-game tutorial. The objective of the game is to reduce your opponents hp to 0. Gameplay unfolds in the following order:

1. Card selection phase

Player one presses 1-3  to secretly select the number of actions they'll take this turn.

Player two presses 1-3 to secretly select the number of actions they'll take this turn.

Actions are revealed.

2. Action phase

Players take turns doing actions. An action is either a move or a double shot.

Move:

Hold arrow keys or wasd for direction and press enter.

Double shot:

Hold arrow keys or wasd for direction and press space bar.

Hold arrow keys or wasd for second shot direction and press space bar.
